title: MyCSUNClass
content:
## Problem
CSUN Students needs a seamless experience selecting classes because the current system of selecting the right classes classes are fragmented. 

### Common Complaints
* Classes fill up too quickly.
  * Students I spoke to had late registration dates
* Scheduling conflicts.
  * Students tend to spend too much times figuring out their classes.
  * Students have to weigh their options to between different class time
* Finding relevant classes.
  * Student have to find an old email from an academic advisor
  * Navigate through the CSUN University Catalog or student portal.

## Personas

### Sam

> Why do classes get filled up so quick?

Sam came to CSUN as a First-Time Freshman. He want to have a flexible class which give him time to study and work at his part-time job

#### Pain Points
* Gets overwhelmed with the options of classes.
* Not sure if his class credits would transfer over to his new major.

#### Goal
* Figure out the most optimal classes to take classes

### Adam

> Be sure to register for classes on time.

Adam is an academic advisor see a variety of students all semester long. When recommending courses to students he has to take into account the previously completed courses and time left for the student.

#### Pain Points
* Sending out lengthy email to explain the recommended courses.
* Ensuring Students are taking the right courses

#### Goal
* Get students to graduate on time.

## Future Plans
The product could be converted to a Software as a service (Saas) and other Universities can brand it and use it for class management.
seoDescription: A webapp that allows CSUN students to wishlist their classes
projectType: UX/UI Case Study and Web App Prototype
